item.description:
Pat's Peak is full for the weekend. At least 3 of us have reserved for Sunday Jan 13 at Waterville Valley at 1:30.
This could very well turn in to two separate meetups if people cant get the freebie lesson at Waterville or want to go to Wachussett as a separate group. Please update your RSVP accordingly and let us know if you'll be joining us.

 

Update:

We're going to Pats Peak in NH, and there is an offer for a free ski or snowboard lesson starting the 12th, so if you're interested in that please go to  http://www.skinh.com/deals/learntoskiandsnowboardmonth.aspx

more info and to register for your coupon starting Jan. 2.

 

Thanks for this info Tuyet!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hi ladies. I haven't had the pleasure of meeting anyone in the group yet, but I am planning on taking my first ever snowboarding lesson in the next few weeks, and thought there must be some interest in some snow fun!

Since I do not drive my current plan is to go to Wachussett and the date and time are placeholders. This is an item on my Life List and my plan is to get in done by mid February and I would love to meet some new friends while I'm at it :)
item.name: Ski or snowboarding?
